mapper.insert: insert into mission (title, context, miImg, catId, userIdx, createdAt) values (#{title},#{context},#{miImg}, #{catId},#{userIdx}, curdate())
mapper.select: SELECT m.idx as idx, m.title as title, m.createdAt as createdAt, m.miImg as miImg, m.likecount as likecount, u.profileImg as uprofileImg, u.nickname as unickname FROM mission m JOIN user u ON m.userIdx = u.idx ORDER BY m.idx DESC limit #{row},8

SELECT m.idx as idx, m.title as title, m.createdAt as createdAt, m.miImg as miImg, m.likecount as likecount, u.profileImg as uprofileImg, u.nickname as unickname FROM mission m JOIN user u ON m.userIdx = u.idx where m.catId = #{catId} ORDER BY m.idx DESC limit #{row},8
select count(idx) from mission where catId=#{catId}
select idx, title, miImg, createdAt, likecount, success from mission where userIdx=#{userIdx} order by createdAt desc
SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalMissions FROM mission WHERE DATE(createdAt) BETWEEN CURDATE() - INTERVAL 8 DAY AND CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AND useridx = #{userIdx}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalMissions, SUM(CASE WHEN success = '성공' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS successfulMissions, ROUND((SUM(CASE WHEN success = '성공' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) / COUNT(*)) * 100) AS successRate FROM mission WHERE DATE(createdAt) BETWEEN CURDATE() - INTERVAL 8 DAY AND CURDATE() - INTERVAL 1 DAY AND (success = '성공' OR success IS NULL OR success = '실패') AND userIdx = #{userIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE mission SET likecount = likecount + 1 WHERE idx = #{idx}
UPDATE mission SET likecount = likecount - 1 WHERE idx = #{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT likecount FROM mission WHERE idx=#{idx}

SELECT m.idx as idx, m.title as title, m.createdAt as createdAt, m.miImg as miImg, m.likecount as likecount, u.profileImg as uprofileImg, u.nickname as unickname FROM bookmark b JOIN mission m ON b.missionIdx = m.idx JOIN user u ON m.userIdx = u.idx WHERE b.userIdx = #{userIdx} ORDER BY m.idx DESC limit #{row},8
select count(missionIdx) from bookmark where userIdx=#{userIdx}
SELECT * FROM mission WHERE userIdx = #{userIdx} AND createdAt = CURDATE();
